name: sweetheart
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a boyfriend or girlfriend: She eventually married her childhood sweetheart.
used for talking to a person that you love, especially a child or person you have a romantic relationship with : [ as form of address ] "Happy birthday, sweetheart," he said.
a kind and generous person: "Oh, you're a sweetheart," she said, when I brought her breakfast in bed.
